name: Project 67 (m-Basilio)
description:
Hello, everybody! 

This game is an adaptation of a story I wrote after having a mind-blowing dream a few months ago! It was such an intense dream that I spent the next day lost in daydreams, so I decided to write and maybe even publish. But then I thought: what if I turn this dystopia into a fun and interesting game? This is the result so far, a prototype...

I count on your feedback to continue, or not, the development of this project.

Please, if you like my game, consider making a donation to support me!

Here is my YouTube channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@teamfulgur
